question: Which Union Ministry implements the Going Online As Leaders (GOAL) Project, along with Facebook India?
option2: Ministry of Human Resources and Development
option3: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
option4: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation:
GOAL is a literacy and mentorship initiative, that aims to identify leaders and make them train 5,000 youth from tribal communities across the country. It is implemented by the Tribal Affairs Ministry.
The Ministry has hosted a webinar on Going Online As Leaders (GOAL) Project, to sensitise Members of Parliament from Scheduled Tribe (ST) Constituencies. Union Minister for Tribal Affairs Arjun Munda and other officials from the Ministry participated in the seminar.
